author: AETerry
title: Stocking Stuffer
review: This is something I recieved as a stocking stuffer one year, it was alright. I couldn't really complain due to it's Wintery, Christmas theme. And it was fun for a couple years to build and display this set come Christmas time.

author: gman28
title: Vintage Set is Awesome!
review:
WOW!

Recently I found this set new in its polybag at a thrift shop. Thinking nothing of it, I bought it to complement the winter season as it was very cheap. Putting it together, I knew this was a vintage set and am very happy to own it.

Although the pieces are pretty basic, this set is more for a decoration and something you can show off to your friends.

author: medleyj
title: my first lego snowman
review: Simple to build with a few harder to find inverted corner pieces and slope corner pieces. Displays well with other Christmas or winter theme sets. Nice addition to a winter village as well. Displaying with other newer snowman sets can show how simple things were in the 1980's and 1990's compared to today.
